1.desc: UC Berkeley has seen changes in more than half of the chancellor's cabinet — 14 top administrative positions — since April 2015. Several positions are currently vacant as key administrators have announced their resignations.

aevp.title: Associate EVCP and Chief of Staff

vcei.title: Vice Chancellor for Equity and Inclusion

vpas.title: Vice Provost for Academic and Space Planning

vcda.title: Vice Chancellor for Development & Alumni Relations

vcaf.title: Vice Chancellor for Administration and Finance

cerc.title: Associate Chancellor/Campus Chief Ethics, Risk and Compliance Officer

vcgc.title: Assistant Chancellor for Government & Community Relations

vccp.title: Associate Vice Chancellor for Communications & Public Affairs

accp.title: Assistant Vice Chancellor for Communications & Public Affairs

vchr.title: Assistant Vice Chancellor for Human Resources

vcit.title: Associate Vice Chancellor for IT & Chief Information Officer

vcfn.title: Associate Vice Chancellor & Chief Financial Officer

2.desc: Vice Chancellor for Research Graham Fleming resigns after allegations arose that he sexually harassed a former campus employee. Paul Alivisatos succeeds him.

16.desc: “We’re all waiting to see what happens when the dust settles,” said campus public policy professor Michael O’Hare. “Are we going to be happier? No one knows.”
